name: thyknow-monorepo
description: ThyKnow Telegram bot with integrated React frontend - Monorepo

scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.clean: npm run clean:backend && npm run clean:frontend
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && rm -rf node_modules backend/node_modules frontend/node_modules
scripts.start:prod: npm run build && npm run start
scripts.deploy:staging: npm run test && npm run build && railway deploy --environment staging
scripts.deploy:production: npm run test && npm run build && railway deploy --environment production
scripts.setup:complete: npm run install:all && npm run migrate && npm run setup:webhook
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace=backend && npm run lint --workspace=frontend
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix --workspace=backend && npm run lint:fix --workspace=frontend
